resources.string: Institutions can analyze alumni data to understand career trends, geographic distribution, and the impact of their education on career success, which can inform curriculum improvements and strategic planning.
This system aids in strengthening the relationship between the institution and its alumni, enhancing opportunities for mentorship, collaboration, and support.

The purpose of an Alumni Tracking System is to maintain a database of former students, facilitate networking, and track their career progress. Its scope includes managing alumni records, organizing events, and fostering engagement through communication platforms
